definition: A category or group of things or people that share similar characteristics or qualities, often used to describe a level of quality, excellence, or superiority. It is commonly used to refer to a group of students in a school year or grade level, or to describe something as being excellent, outstanding, or top-notch.

examples.german: Sie ist in der Klasse sehr beliebt.
examples.english: She is very popular in class.

examples.german: Die Klasse hat eine Klassenfahrt gemacht.
examples.english: The class went on a field trip.
He is the top student in the class.
